about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: Hi, I'm John - a passionate web designer and photographer based in Bangkok, Thailand.
about.paragraph2: I've been creating digital experiences for over 5 years, specializing in modern web design and user interface development. My work focuses on creating clean, functional, and beautiful designs that help businesses connect with their audiences.
about.paragraph3: When I'm not designing websites, you can find me behind the camera capturing moments and telling stories through photography.
